## `avial`: A Mixed Bag of R Functions

![logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aravind-j/avial/master/inst/extdata/avial.png)

###### Version : [0.0.0.9000](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/); License: [GPL-2\|GPL-3](https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/)

##### Aravind, J.

Division of Germplasm Conservation, ICAR-National Bureau of Plant
Genetic Resources, New Delhi.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Description

A bunch of miscellaneous R functions primarly for personal use.These
functions may be migrated to other packages in the future as required.

## Installation

The development version can be installed from github as follows:

``` r
# Install development version from Github
devtools::install_github("aravind-j/avial")
```

## Whatâ€™s new

To know whats new in this version type:

``` r
news(package='avial')
```

## Links

[Github page](https://github.com/aravind-j/avial)

[Documentation website](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/)

## Citing `avial`

To cite the methods in the package use:

``` r
citation("avial")
```

``` R
To cite the R package 'augmentedRCBD' in publications use:

  Aravind, J. ().  avial: A Mixed Bag of R Functions. R package version
  0.0.0.9000, https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Manual{,
    title = {avial: A Mixed Bag of R Functionss},
    author = {J. Aravind},
    note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000 https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/},
  }

This free and open-source software implements academic research by the
authors and co-workers. If you use it, please support the project by
citing the package.
```

# Package index

## Helpers

- [`flatten.data.frame()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/flatten.data.frame.md)
  : Flatten Duplicate Rows in a Data Frame

## Plotting helpers

- [`binw()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/binw.md) :
  Calculate the Bin Width for Plotting Histograms

## Dendrogram helpers

- [`group_constrained_order()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/group_constrained_order.md)
  : Ordering by keeping defined groups together
- [`reorder_dend_by_groups()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/reorder_dend_by_groups.md)
  : Reorder a dendrogram to keep specified groups of tips adjacent

## Diversity functions

- [`diversity.calc()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity.calc.md)
  : Compute Diversity Measures
- [`diversity.compare()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity.compare.md)
  : Compare Diversity Measures
- [`berger_parker()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`berger_parker_reciprocal()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`simpson()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`gini_simpson()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`simpson_max()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`simpson_reciprocal()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`simpson_relative()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`simpson_evenness()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`shannon()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`shannon_max()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`shannon_relative()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`shannon_ens()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`mcintosh_diversity()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`mcintosh_evenness()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`smith_wilson()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`heip_evenness()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`margalef_index()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`menhinick_index()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`brillouin_index()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`hill_number()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`renyi_entropy()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`tsallis_entropy()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  [`hill_evenness()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity_functions.md)
  : Diversity Index Functions
- [`perm.test.global()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/permutation_tests.md)
  [`perm.test.pairwise()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/permutation_tests.md)
  : Permutation Tests
- [`bootstrap.ci()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/bootstrap.ci.md)
  : Bootstrap Confidence Intervals
- [`diversity.profile()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/diversity.profile.md)
  : Generate Diversity Profiles for Parametric Indices

## Wrappers and helpers for `ggplot2`

- [`freq_distribution()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/freq_distribution.md)
  : Plot Frequency Distribution and Density Plots

- [`groupwise_bar()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/groupwise_bar.md)
  : Plot Group-wise Bar Plots

- [`groupwise_histogram()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/groupwise_histogram.md)
  : Plot Group-wise Histograms

- [`groupwise_dumbell()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/groupwise_dumbell.md)
  : Plot Group-wise Dumbell Plots

- [`uniform_barwidth_grid()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/uniform_barwidth_grid.md)
  :

  Plot a List of `ggplot2` Barplots as a Grid with with Uniform Width of
  the Bars

- [`remove_scales()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/remove_scales.md)
  :

  Remove scales from `ggplot` objects

- [`dnorm_ggplot()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/dnorm_ggplot.md)
  :

  Function to Add Normal Distribution Curve in
  [`ggplot2`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/ggplot2-package.html)
  histogram

## Statistical functions

- [`pairwise.augmentedRCBD()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/pairwise.augmentedRCBD.md)
  :

  Perform Pairwise t Tests of Adjusted Means from `augmentedRCBD` Output

- [`mse.bartlett.test()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/mse.bartlett.test.md)
  : Bartlett's Test of Homogeneity of Error Variances

- [`summary_quant()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/summary_quant.md)
  [`summary_qual()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/summary_quant.md)
  : Summary Statistics of Qualitative and Quantitative trait data

## Prepare input files

- [`prep_mstrat_input()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/prep_mstrat_input.md)
  :

  Prepare Input Files for `MStrat`

- [`prep_powercore_input()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/prep_powercore_input.md)
  :

  Prepare Input Files for `PowerCore`

## Prepare output files

- [`parse_mstrat_out()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/reference/parse_mstrat_out.md)
  :

  Parse Output Files from `MStrat`

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Highlight Genotypes in Group-wise Histograms using Group-wise Point
  and Error Bar
  Plots](https://aravind-j.github.io/avial/articles/Highlight-Checks.md):
